Articles.Content:
So i was thinking maybe we could transport like runways and launchpads to other planets and youl need to mine certain materials to make a factory

 

and also to implement a oxygen system and bearings and pistons would be cool

Yeah um 

Also plenty of different life support mods.

Remember. SQUAD is small company. Adding everything what players suggest would take years.

That's why modding community is so big.
